thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Groupon to Cut Nearly 10% of Workforce
thread.title_full: Groupon to Cut Nearly 10% of Workforce - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Groupon to Cut Nearly 10% of Workforce
text:
Groupon Inc. said Tuesday that it plans to cut 1,100 jobs globally over the next year as part of a restructuring of its international business.
As of last December, Groupon had about 12,000 employees, according to a regulatory filing.
Groupon said...
